FuncDef:
The dhcp client request option-list command configures a list of request options that the Option55 field in DHCP Request packets carries besides the default options.
The undo dhcp client request option-list command deletes a list of request options that the Option55 field in DHCP Request packets carries besides the default options. The dhcp client request option-list command configures a list of request options that the Option55 field in DHCP Request packets carries besides the default options. The undo dhcp client request option-list command deletes a list of request options that the Option55 field in DHCP Request packets carries besides the default options. By default, the Option 55 field in DHCP Request packets carries only default request options.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a list of request options that the Option55 field carries besides the default options.
The options are as follows:
1471742436667120129143145146148150
